properties.areaDesc: Lonoke, AR; Desha, AR; Arkansas, AR; Lincoln, AR; Monroe, AR; Prairie, AR; Cleveland, AR; Jefferson, AR
properties.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued January 11 at 1:29AM CST until January 11 at 2:30AM CST by NWS Little Rock AR
properties.description:
The National Weather Service in Little Rock has issued a

* Severe Thunderstorm Warning for...
Northeastern Cleveland County in southeastern Arkansas...
Southeastern Prairie County in central Arkansas...
Southeastern Lonoke County in central Arkansas...
Northwestern Desha County in southeastern Arkansas...
Monroe County in eastern Arkansas...
Eastern Jefferson County in southeastern Arkansas...
Northern Lincoln County in southeastern Arkansas...
Arkansas County in southeastern Arkansas...

* Until 230 AM CST.

* At 129 AM CST, severe thunderstorms were located along a line
extending from near Hazen to Brummitt to near Madding to 8 miles
northwest of Feenyville, moving east at 30 mph.

HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts.

SOURCE...Radar indicated.

IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees.

* Locations impacted include...
Pine Bluff...                     Stuttgart...
Clarendon...                      Hazen...
De Valls Bluff...                 Altheimer...
Gould...                          Gillett...
Holly Grove...                    Humphrey...
Grady...                          Fredonia...
Humnoke...                        Almyra...
St. Charles...                    Ulm...
Roe...                            Dobbs Landing...
Whitefield...                     Little Bayou Meto Park...

This includes the following highways...
Interstate 40 between mile markers 191 and 196.
Interstate 530 between mile markers 42 and 46.
properties.instruction:
A Tornado Watch remains in effect until 600 AM CST for central,
eastern and southeastern Arkansas.

For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a
building.

Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and flash
flooding may occur. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded
roadways.
